title: Dragon ball-lee
body: Should be a lee sin skin (someone else thought of this, I just came up with the title)

replies.body: Possible Intellectual property rights problems?  I think our friendly rolling ball of death could roll up into a dragon ball too :P
It has been done before though none come off the top of my head right now
Where's the picture or the description?
someone else has it, I just posted this to give it attention
